item.description:
Halloween Pub Crawl. Let's meet at Dillon's on Boylston Street and let the games begin! Feel free to drop in later and the fun doesn't have to end when the crawl does. The theme is Halloween but COSTUMES ARE NOT REQUIRED. PS: If anyone dresses up like Lady Gaga, I'll buy them a drink :) (I may have just gotten myself into some serious financial trouble. Go easy on me, I work for a non profit). Dillons 4 - 5 Cactus Club 5 - 6 McGreevy's 6 -7 Pour House 7- 8 Lir 8- 9

 

There's more people signed up on FB
item.name: Booze & Halloween
